II.i.2.C.3.b
.
Procedures for Handling Miscellaneous Mail
The table below contains procedures for handling miscellaneous mail.
Mail Category
Procedure
Unidentifiable
Follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.C.5
for handling unidentifiable mail in the CM unidentifiable mail queue.
Undeliverable
Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i,Â 2.C.6
when the USPS returns mail as undeliverable.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
